website_summaries.verdict: A quality product from a respected manufacturer.
pros: Tourmaline technology and extreme heat combine to deliver long-lasting style
cons: One of the most expensive products on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: 25mm Jose Eber Curling Iron
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove this curling iron. I purchased the 19mm curling iron a year or so before I bought this one and I love it but wanted one that gave me more wavy, loose curls. This does an excellent job! My hair is very long (almost to my belly button), very slick, and won't hold a curl even with product. But with this curling iron (and the 19mm one), I can curl my hair, not use any product at all and it's still curled the next day and sometimes the day after if my hair doesn't get too greasy. I recommend this curling iron to any friends who complain about their hair not staying curled. It's the best!
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Curling Iron Ever!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best curling iron EVER! It doesn't have a clip so you wrap as much around the barrel as you would like. It gets hot rather quickly, and comes with a cute glove to place on the hand that is holding the hair in place on the barrel. Just remember to wrap your hair up and around the barrel. This makes for a better curl! When you curl it, it will initially look perfectly curled, but if you would like a more natural look, just shake you hair a few times. Enjoy😉
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seller shipped super fast. This curling iron is the BOMB
customer_reviews.text: Seller shipped super fast. This curling iron is the BOMB.COM. It gives my unruly natural curls a sense of direction...a sense of purpose even. They are like “hey lady, why didn't you show us the way before?...Seriously. We could have been worthy all this time.” Yes, that was my curly hair talking. Love this curling iron. DO use the glove. I've been sporting bandaids due to my thrill seeking daredevil no glove moments.
customer_reviews.author: Golly Stella

customer_reviews.title: Imitation
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy! This is imitation wand .. In addition, I received a wand that does bot even say pro series like in the picture they are showing as the product. That means, they took a picture to an original Jose Eber wand and are sending an imitation. I know is an imitation since My friend has the ORIGinal and this nowhere close to hers... Buy your product somewhere else... I waisted my money...
customer_reviews.author: Yeyek

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curling wand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this curling wand. I bought my first one 6 years ago on amazon and I just had to throw it out because the heating element wasn’t heating hot enough.... I’d say 6 years is pretty good for the price! My new wand is the same quality as before. I love the simplicity of this tool. Also, my hair is incredibly thick and naturally very straight.... but with this wand my hair holds a curl all day (and night!)
customer_reviews.author: EBOGES

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful waves
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied as it gave my hair beautiful waves after holding it place around the iron for 15-20 seconds. My hair is medium length, thin, and I have a lot of it. However the iron does not have a protective tip and i accidentally burnt my face with it. It's more my fault than the iron's but it should have a protective tip. That's why I give it 4 stars and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Aina

customer_reviews.title: Curls hold up amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over 2 years now and it is the most amazing styling product I’ve ever owned. I get compliments every time I use it to curl my hair. I have thin, pin straight hair and this is the only thing that works. Lasts and lasts. I’ve gone a whole 12 hour shift with no hair spray. If I’m ping outdoors (in Florida) I use big sexy spray in the red can. It will last for two days. I can’t say enough about this wand.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie B.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful design and everything
customer_reviews.text: I've used this only once, but I'm thrilled with it! The unboxing was shocking considering the low price point. Frustration-free packaging is a mega win, beautiful design and everything. I used it on my frizzy air-dried hair today and it smoothed everything and gave me soft curls. I've had a hard time with my hair keeping curl lately (could be the time of year and climate), but they've held nicely. The wand heated up quickly and was a great temperature. I was a little concerned about not having the option to adjust the temperature, but it hasn't been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Long hair only
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and stuff but I would recommend to large hair, mine is short and the curls don’t last at all, but it’s good quality though
customer_reviews.author: gladys cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for the price! My curls tend to fall flatter than I would like by the end of the night, but I have notoriously hard-to-curl hair. Be wary that this tool gets incredibly hot - for both your skin, and for your hair (drying). USE THE GLOVE that comes with the product. I had a burn on my arm that lasted about two weeks with just a second or two of misplacement of the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: awesome curling iron!
customer_reviews.text: Works great...be careful not to burn your hair...they get really hot!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Cannot live without it!
customer_reviews.text: My one and only beach waves curling iron. I ditched all other curling irons after this
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong size iron
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and was really disappointed because they sent me the wrong size iron (19mm not 25mm). Then when I went to exchange the price went up. I saw that Inam not the only person this happened to. It is a great iron, perfect curls, good quality, great hold, so I am reordering and really hoping they send the right size this time.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Prue

customer_reviews.title: Great curling wand
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite curling wand. It works better than others that cost 3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Brush them curls out girl!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wand! I waited to buy it, all my gals had them and I was late to the party but thank god I finally purchased one!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Seaworth

customer_reviews.title: BEST wand!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite curling wand ever! I’ve been using this for over 7 years. Best curling wand. You won’t regret purchasing.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to get hot enough. Wish I could send it back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! tried from my girlfrind and got the same one!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curls
customer_reviews.text: It is very quick to do the curls and the curls last for then a day and curls are beautiful😀
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in way faster than I had expected. Just two days after I placed my order. Once I plugged it up and tried it out I realized its a little more difficult than a traditional clip curling iron but once you get the hang of this it's soo much better! It's much hotter than a traditional curling iron. I think that's why these curls stay in so good. Just simply hold your hair on it for a couple seconds instead of how long you would with a regular curling iron. It's a little pricey but I would definitely recommend this product and am never goin back to the clip curling irons!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel90

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this curling iron
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this curling iron. I have fine hair and it holds my curls for days. The glove that the send with it is very thin, so you might want to order another glove.
customer_reviews.author: Tari Turner

customer_reviews.title: My favorite type of wand
customer_reviews.text: My favorite type of wand. The first I bought in the store and this was ordered as a replacement after years of using the other one. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like you just came from the beach !!
customer_reviews.text: This iron curls" hard to curl hair " best one I have ever used!! .

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Curler
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a curler that gave me BIG curls and this curler did exactly that. Its my everyday curler and its also very cute. The curls last all day and that's with only using a little hairspray. I love it and definitely recommend to someone who wants big curls and not little jerry curls :))

customer_reviews.text: High heat makes soft curls that last. Better than clip type curling irons.

It gets really hot so you just need to be careful with it so as not to burn your hand or your face. I use the 'Ove' Glove on my left hand to protect it while using it. You could use any pot holder type glove that withstands a lot of heat on your hand to prevent burns. I highly recommend this item.

customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this curling iron. It's heats up fast and creates curls that hold. The 1" barrel is perfect for curls that aren't too tight but last throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Creates nice waves - you will need to use the glove ...
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly in the mail and exactly what I expected! Creates nice waves - you will need to use the glove though to make sure you don't burn your hand!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Murphree

customer_reviews.title: I love this curler
customer_reviews.text: I love this curler, my friend has the same one so now I don't have to bug her about borrowing hers as much. I have very curly hair and this iron makes my natural curls look so much less of a frizzy mess. I am however a bit sad because I wish I had gotten a size smaller than this, to get that more messy curly look. But by taking smaller strands and more sections, I've found I can still achieve the look I am going for. Plus a lot of hair spray. But I recommend this iron for anyone, especially if you're like me and just need to fix a couple of curls every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Long lasting hair style. Doesn't burn or damage the hair. But be careful while using it because It's soooooo hot and causes series burns to skin. You must wear long-sleeved cotton tops.
customer_reviews.author: Lulwa

customer_reviews.title: Very hot but too small for long hair
customer_reviews.text: Curling iron gets very hot. Curls are tighter than I expected. This curling iron is about an inch in width. I have long hair (below the bra strap) so I probably need something larger than this for bigger curls. Use the glove. You will burn yourself if not used to using this type of curler.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Zawacki

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: i'm so glad that i bought this curling iron. my hair is really straight so it's kinda hard to curl it by just using a curling iron that i bought before and i paid almost $50. my best friend bought the Jose eber curling iron at the mall and she paid almost 100bucks for it, she couldn't believed that her hair was still curly the next day. i decided to searched it online and found a really good deal here on amazon so i bought it right away and im really glad that i did. now my sister want to buy this curling iron too and i told her to go to amazon ;-)
customer_reviews.author: rac1973

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Gives a loose spiral curl. Not sure I'm a fan of clipless. By wrapping hair around the barrel you kind of twist the hair as you go so not all of the actually comes in contact with heat. Maybe I'm doing it wrong. I can get a full day of wear from the curls so pretty good for me. I'm lucky to get a few hours from other curling irons.

customer_reviews.title: super fast, smooth, shiny, gorgeous hair
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this curling iron! It works in a a fraction of the time of a traditional clip curling iron, so even though I have long, thick hair, I can curl it all in just 10 minutes, and the curls last all day, no problem. No dents, beautifully smooth. It also makes my hair very shiny and gets rid of any frizziness. The price on this item seems to jump around a lot. I paid $51 in October 2010.
customer_reviews.author: More Tea Please

customer_reviews.title: Jose Eber Curling Iron
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a clipless curling iron and I love the results. This package comes with a heat-resistant glove, so you keep from accidentally burning yourself when doing your hair.

customer_reviews.title: Jose Eber
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly the same product the price was great & I love using it!! Fast shipping and clean transaction thanks!

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: the curling iron was NOT easy to use, which may be because my hair is thick and stick straight. My hair would not twist easily around the clipless iron. i tried returning the item by contacting the vendor via amazon.com (their contact info was not listed ANYWHERE (receipts, shipping labels, website, etc.)) but 3 weeks later, i have still not received a response. DO NOT purchase from Dead Sea Beauty!

customer_reviews.title: Good Iron, but Defective
customer_reviews.text: Love the wand, but ordered 2 and both were defective. First one sparked, popped, and blew out at the connection of cord to the iron. I returned it and the next one has the cord already pulled out from the base of the wand in only using it 3 weeks, and I'm worried about it doing the same thing. Now, I'm outside of the amazon 30 days return. I tried contacting Jose Eber, but they didn't respond to my e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Best curling wand.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second wand, even though my first one still works beautifully (after 7 years), the cord was starting to separate from swivel base so I wanted a new one. This wand curls hair easily and curls last days (easily 4 in non humid climates). I love the loose waves it creates. This barrel is the perfect size. Example of curling: 1st pic is 2 day old curls. 2nd pic is 5 days old curls and 3rd pic is same day curls (curled in morning and was windy outdoors and took pic late afternoon). I sleep with my hair in a loose top knot.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Curling Irons Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this line of curling irons. The smaller the rod, the longer the curl will stay in... depending upon your hair type. My hair is fine and straight, so the .75 works for me when it is humid out. If it is dry, I like the 25mm because it creates the perfect curls. I can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! It actually curls my fine
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It actually curls my fine, blond hair and it holds. Minus a point because it's a little hard to get used to and the heat protecting glove should be a bit thicker (my fingers were all pretty much numb by the end). But it's a great little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne & Sarah Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it almost on a daily basis, i'm using it for my sisters too, so handy.

customer_reviews.title: Can NOT Live without THIS!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is naturally straight and for a while have been using a regular curling iron to make waves....but this product beats the old fashion curling iron any day! Its faster and easier to use! It makes perfect little ringlets and when they fall perfect waves. I would always have creases in my hair from the clamp of my old iron, not anymore! I have gotten so many compliments on my hair since I started using it! Be sure to wear the glove that comes with it though! I got lazy a few times and burned myself! No fun! I would recommend this product to all my girlfriends wait....I already have! (=

customer_reviews.title: Wow! My hair finally curls!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair and never holds a curl. If it does it is gone in minutes. This is the first curling iron that actually leaves my hair curly for hours. The clip less style does take a couple attempts to get used to but once you get the hang of it you will not go back to the other style. Just make sure to wear the glove so you do not get burned.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I've tried that is able to curl my hair and make the curls last more than a few hours (other than sleeping with wet hair in curls, which is very uncomfortable and the curls don't come out as I want). It is obviously very hot, but it doesn't seem to burn my hair. Now I am going to get rid of all the other stuff that do not work for my hair and keep only this one.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curling iron now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need any other curing iron but this one! It beats all the rest of them! The curls stays much longer and beautifully! It's so fast and easy to curl my hair now! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: رائع جدا والجهاز يعمل وخفيف I. Like it. Fast dlivery.
customer_reviews.author: shosho

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and needed to make those perfect waves in my hair
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and needed to make those perfect waves in my hair. Wand gets VERY hot though. I have definitely burned myself quite a bit so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely wonderful. I have went through two other curling wands to find this one and it's the only one I use now because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: J.F.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair but its fine, made my hair crimpy and never made a curl. Wanted it to work ;/
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: NOT for my straight hair. Hair would not hold curl no matter what temperature it was set at.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wallets

product_meta.title: Jose Eber Curling Iron, Pink, 25mm Includes Heat Resistant Glove
feature_bullets: 25mm (1 inch) clipless barrel, Light weight ergonomic design, Korean tourmaline ceramic barrel
360 degree swivel cord design with hook, Professional length power cord, Weighted handle for safe resting position
